preConditions.onFailMessage: Ignored AddColumn for CUSPBOUNDARY_X to table SPOT_POINT as table does not exist or column already exists.

column.name: CUSPBOUNDARY_X
column.remarks: The "CuspBoundary" for the spot position. The the area where the path planner will attempt to place the cusp for the spot point.
